title: Add GitHub-ready root README.md for DarkPattern Shield

requirements.text: Create a top-level `README.md` at the repository root suitable for pushing to GitHub, documenting the DarkPattern Shield project in English. The README must include: (1) project overview, (2) key pages/routes and what they do (Home `/`, Subscription Trap Detector `/detector`, Personal Digital Risk Test `/risk-test`, Scam Reporting `/report`, Browser Extension Concept `/extension`), (3) prerequisites (Node, pnpm, DFX), (4) local development run steps for the Internet Computer canister (`dfx start`, `dfx deploy`) and for the React frontend dev server, (5) a brief note explaining authentication via Internet Identity (what the user experiences at a high level), and (6) how to export/download the full source code using the existing export scripts and the exported `README_EXPORT.md` behavior (copied from `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md`).

quotes: provide a readme file of this project to push in github

acceptanceCriteria: A new file `README.md` exists at the repository root (not under `frontend/`).
README.md is valid, fully-rendered Markdown (no broken/truncated code fences).
README.md includes a section listing the appâ€™s main pages and their routes: `/`, `/detector`, `/risk-test`, `/report`, `/extension`.
README.md includes local run instructions that reference using DFX to start the local IC network and deploy canisters, and instructions to run the frontend dev server from the `frontend/` directory.
README.md includes a short, user-facing description of Internet Identity authentication (no third-party auth providers).

README.md includes an export section referencing `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh`, `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1`, the `export/` output folder, and that `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md` is copied into the archive root as `README_EXPORT.md`.

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable paths).
Use English for all user-facing README text.
nonGoals: Implement any new app features beyond documentation.
Change backend canister logic or frontend routing/UI as part of this request.
